checks.name: init_validation
checks.jq: select(.type == "system" and .subtype == "init") | .plugins[]?.name == "patent-kit" and (.skills? | any(. == "patent-kit:targeting")) and (.mcp_servers? | any(.name | test("google-patent-cli") and .status == "running")) and (.mcp_servers? | any(.name | test("arxiv-cli") and .status == "running"))

checks.name: search_patents_called
checks.jq: .message.content[]? | select(.type == "tool_use" and ((.name | test("search|Search|WebSearch")) or (.name == "Skill" and (.input.skill | test("targeting")))))
